description:
This courses features nearly 30 full lectures of information, along with slides to take away and quizzes for quick learning. Designed by a small business owner, with years of experience implementing accounting into businesses, this course is designed to give users of Xero a fantastic overview of the system and a springboard to use the system efficiently within their own business.

As questions come in from students on some of the more common stumbling blocks we will continue to add lectures to answers these for the benefit of all. I have also included as a bonus some training on Microsoft Excel and the use of it for reporting purposes and creating customised dashboards.
title: From Xero to Hero - Mastering Cloud Accounting
